comments:
Description:
Download ALLINONE package, open Eclipse. Then switch to Report Designer Perspective, an error pops up.

Error log:

It is not a duplicate of 141981
It is not a duplicate of 141981
Do not show properties page in Property Editor View when there are no report files opened.
